text: Longin Hieronim Pastusiak (pronounced ; 22 August 1935 – 10 January 2025) was a Polish politician and historian. He was the Marshal of the Senate from 2001 to 2005. He was a member of the Democratic Left Alliance. Pastusiak died on 10 January 2025, at the age of 89.Nie żyje Longin Pastusiak. Były marszałek Senatu miał 89 lat. title: Longin Pastusiak
